posts.content:
Hello,

Mithdradates' Bone Breaker build is one of my all time favorite NWN builds. It mixes some of my favorite classes and weapon focus and I find it a solid fun build to level on most servers. That being said I only have one complaint and I come here seeking advice on whether it can be tweaked without ruining the build/feat progression. My worry is this: Trickery domain grants Improved Invisibility (II) at Cleric lvl 9 (caster 5), given Mith's build you do not attain Cleric lvl 9 until overall level 25. I think the concealment granted from II is crucial, especially when the Cleric lacks any such spells prior to that (unless I am forgetting something). Waiting until level 25 to have access to that spell just seems too painful in most servers. Is there any way to shuffle the level splits around some to nab II pre-epic? I am sure I could have figured this out on my own, but I lack a build testing mod at the moment and I figure those here are far better at this than I. Any help or advice would be appreciated.

Yeah, there is more than one way: Go Cleric 17 Fighter 3 pre-epic and save all the WM enhancements for later. Or you can buy Dusts of Disappearance until lvl 25 if your server has them. Up to you

If I were to build this toon, I might even consider a Cleric 16 WM 16 FTR 8 for 2 extra bonus feats. You'd lose access to lvl 9 spells, but who needs them in this build? You actually get 3 extra feats because you don't need the Great Wisdom he takes at lvl 30.

Take it EZ!

Thanks for the speedy reply Max!

Dumping Cleric levels to pick up more feats might be something I consider...I guess I'll have to see whether I like those extra lvl 9 spells. If taking that route, would it be beneficial to improve WM to 19 instead of Fighter to 8?

posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content:
I don't think a Cleric / WM is going to have ANY AB problems, so maybe not. It's 2 feats x 1 feat and 1 AB. For that particular one I'd take the 2 feats, but that's your choice. Cleric 17 Ftr 4 WM 19 is also valid, I'd say 50-50.

Take it EZ!
